channel.title: recruiting on Joyce Kung
channel.description: Recent content in recruiting on Joyce Kung

item.title: Looking for Work: New Grad Edition
item.description: UPDATE (2020-11-13): I am no longer looking for work! Happy to say that I accepted a position as a Site Reliability Engineer in Toronto working remotely for a company. May share more details about this as my start date looms closer (as it stands, we’re about 7 months out), but haven’t decided yet. Going to leave this post up for posterity’s sake. Thanks to anyone who sent me an email about this over the last couple months!
